original_title: The Cultural Revolution: Mao's Last Battle
overview: This series presents the definitive history of the Cultural Revolution, its background, and aftermath, blending an incredible array of documentary footage with discussion by Chinese contemporaries, diplomats, and scholars, including Roxanne Witke, the only Westerner to interview Maoâ€™s wife, Jiang Qing.
title: The Cultural Revolution: Mao's Last Battle
